content: What's the right way to modify Condition (new structure definition with Condition as base type) to require Condition.category (CodeableConcept type) to be the 'encounter-diagnosis' code and also have that be the default if nothing is set? Is there an example of doing something like that? The guidance for fixedValue says "This is not recommended for Coding and CodeableConcept"

FHIR doesn't allow defining defaults - and certainly doesn't allow defining defaults for profiles. A profile can declare a 'pattern' for a CodeableConcept which would require that one of the codings must have a particular code and system.
Ok, so how would I say at least that it must have a particular code if fixedValue isn't to be used?
